update KDI_COMPANY
COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ACCOUNT = #{companyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_PWD = #{companyPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
